channel.title: Plz help me with a other thing
channel.description:
well my source got somthing like you need to be member to wield this but i go to chars and it stands on character-ismember = 1 0,2 and 3 dossent owrk tho
how can i put it on ? so i can make peops member in my server [br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 08:08:53 AM[/size][hr]ore how i deleet!!!

item.title: Plz help me with a other thing
item.dc:creator: @Bobbert Bobbert
item.description:
@Bobbert wrote:

Well you could either try find the problem in item.java which is seting the items as members only, or you could take advantage of the members only feature and give people members rights,

Read full topic
